original_text: “You too, Pharaoh, will be broken and will lie among the uncircumcised, with those killed by the sword.
korean_text: 오직 너는 할례를 받지 못한 자와 함께 패망할 것임이여 칼에 죽임을 당한 자와 함께 누우리로다

sentences.original_text: and will lie among the uncircumcised,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 할례받지 않은 자들 가운데 누우리라,

sentences.original_text: with those killed by the sword.
